name: Personal Portfolio
desc: Hub for my projects, work, and experience
descLong: My portfolio encompasses my projects, work, and experience. It's a great way to practice my React skills, something I've wanted to improve since graduating from RPI.
infoList: Created multiple components for each aspect of the portfolio
Designed the site to mimic MacOS windows
Stored data (like these projects) in JSON files to ease the modification of components in the future

name: Tip Calculator
desc: Calculator to compute how to split a bill among a group of people
descLong: This web application requires a user to input the total amount of the bill, number of people to split the bill, and the percent tip. Based on that, the logic outputs the total amount with tip, amount to be paid by each person, total tip, and tip amount per person.
infoList: Built using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and jQuery
Each time an input is changed, the outputs are dynamically calculated
jQuery logic does not allow user to type in non-numeric values less than 0

name: Interactive Card Details
desc: Credit card form with real-time updates in the GUI
descLong: This credit card form requires users to fill out their name, credit card number, expiration date, and security code (CVC). While input fields are edited, the images on the right with the front and back of the credit card are dynamically updated as well.
infoList: Built using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and jQuery
Each time an input is changed, the credit card images on the left dynamically change
Utilizes jQuery Form Validator plugin to validate the credit card fields
Ensures fields are not empty upon submission (data is not stored anywhere!)

name: Shortly URL Landing Page
desc: Landing page to create shortened links with the Shortly API
descLong: This web page allows users to quickly shorten long URLs then copy and paste them. The logic checks if the user has already shortened that link. Data is also stored in the window's session, so users can go back to their list even after closing out the site.
infoList: Built using React, Sass/SCSS, and Bootstrap
Validates the link field to check if it is a valid link or if it is empty
Copies link to clipboard and changes the state of the button upon doing so
